text: Nawajilema mizilo ja heye na ilagano yaliditile na wasekulu wa hewo na makanyo goyawapele. Nawajifugamila jimalukolo jilihela utanzi mbaka nawo nawali walihela utanzi kahi. Nawawinza vihendo vya wanhu wa isi wawele habehi na hewo, hanga Mkulu Nguluwi nayali yawakanyile kwa kuwalonjela, “Mleche kudita kota vyowalingudita.”
